**In Icecream business, To create a model that could predict the daily revenue
in dollars based on the outside air temperature (degC) using Simple linear
regression.**
source.b62191ec:
**The Simple Linear model is generated as, y = 21.517397x +
43.359228 by using training data. This model show that increase in
temperature, increases the revenue of the Ice cream. Decrease in
temperature, decreases the revenue of the Ice cream. This linear model
has the accuracy of 0.9771573932804641 (i.e 97.7%). So this model is
the best fit for the revenue of Ice cream based on the outside air
temperature. In both test data and train data, Revenue of Ice cream
increases by increasing temperature and vice versa.**
